meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the mulberry family, producing large round edible seeds.
meanings.sent1: The breadnut tree in the garden provides shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy roasting and eating breadnuts as a tasty snack.
meanings.sent3: When the breadnut tree heard a joke, it burst into laughter!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the rustling leaves of a breadnut tree in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The breadnut tree stood tall, its branches heavy with ripe seeds.

meanings.definition: The large round edible seeds of the breadnut tree.
meanings.sent1: She ground the breadnut seeds to make flour for baking.
meanings.sent2: The breadnut seeds are rich in nutrients and flavor.
meanings.sent3: The breadnut seeds rolled off the table, causing a comical chaos.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like polished breadnut seeds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked breadnut seeds filled the kitchen.
